item.title: Crowdstrike Blowup
item.description: Massive Crash: Did Layer 8 Goof Up Again? So get this - airports, banks, and a bunch of other places totally crashed today. Everyone’s first thought? Massive cyber attack, right? Nope, not this time. Picture this: Workers all over the world show up, fire up their computers, and bam! Blue screen of death. Turns out, according to CrowdStrike, it was a botched update that made Windows systems go haywire, no matter where the computer was.
